Create a line of scented Post-it Notes that are infused with essential oils to enhance productivity and well-being.
Design a smart Post-it Note system that connects to a digital platform, allowing users to digitally capture and organize their notes, ideas, and to-do lists.
Introduce a set of customizable Post-it Notes that can be personalized with a user's name, initials, or a favorite quote to make them more meaningful and memorable.
Develop a set of interactive Post-it Notes that can be used as a game or puzzle, such as a word search or Sudoku, to make note-taking more engaging and fun.
Create a line of eco-friendly Post-it Notes made from recycled materials, biodegradable paper, or plant-based materials to appeal to environmentally conscious consumers.
